detail_desc: Trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap patch pockets with press-studs, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, gathers at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Short skirt with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.

Oversized, straight-cut shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in cotton jersey with a round neckline and dropped shoulders.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a frilled collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Jersey lining.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Nursing top in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with functional fastening for easier nursing access, padded inserts and an elasticated hem.
Knee-length jersey crêpe dress with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps, detachable tie at the waist and a softly draping A-line skirt. Lined bodice.

T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in easy-iron premium cotton with a cut-away collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the narrow cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and tie detail at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and dropped shoulders with a press-stud at one side. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a silicone print on the front.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a motif.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with lapped shoulders, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Picot trim around the neckline and at the cuffs.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Fitted vest top in jersey crêpe with zigzag seams around the neckline and armholes.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif on the front. Patterned leggings with an elasticated waist.
Microfibre leggings with elastication at the waist and hems.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in a viscose weave. V-neck vest top with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Shorts with frill-trimmed hems and an elasticated waist with a decorative bow.

Soft, non-wired, push-up bra in lace with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes, and elastication at the hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with short flutter sleeves.
Double-breasted jacket in bouclé made from a cotton blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short, pleated dress in recycled polyester chiffon with a stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck and a large cut-out section at the back. Short, flared raglan sleeves, a seam at the waist with a wide waistband and a flared skirt. Lined.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt that can be wound around several times. Unlined.
Large scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.

Pull-on trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, low crotch and diagonal side pockets. Legs with shaping darts at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a soft wool blend with a hood, buttons down the front, concealed press-studs at the crotch and trimmed edges. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft linen jersey with a round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the top, a smocked seam at the waist and short kimono sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and appliqué on the front. Top with a velour front and long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. High waist, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and wide, straight legs with sewn-in creases down the front.

Calf-length lace dress with buttons at the top and a square neckline with a smocked edge and small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and a flared skirt with seams that have small frill trims, and an overlocked hem. Underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Short dress in jersey with a soft brushed finish. The dress has a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.

Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist, pleats at the top and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless long dress in crinkled satin and lace with a deep V-neck, small frills at the shoulders and waist, and a narrow opening and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short, smocked top in cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps and a flounce at the top and hem.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a text print on the front. UNICEF does not endorse any company, brand or product.
Loafers with rounded, slightly pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top.

Suit trousers in a cotton weave with stretch. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Tights that provide support for the tummy, thighs and calves as well as encouraging circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist and extra space for a growing tummy. 30 denier.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, nepped sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a small print on the chest.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short lace dress with long sleeves, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a raw-edge, scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and skinny legs.
Hat in braided paper straw with a band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and scalloped edges around the neckline and cuffs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lacing at the sides.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket at the back.
T-shirt in jersey made from organic cotton with an open chest pocket.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Bomber jacket in mesh with reversible sequins, a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined in airy jersey.
Flat cap in a cotton weave with elastication at the back. Lining and sweatband in cotton.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Top in soft, stretch jersey with short, pleated, cuffed puff sleeves.
